html:
Computing For Hospitality 2

Throughout this module, students will be taught new Excel functions allowing them to design tool with fully automated task. The module focuses on key tools used commonly in the hospitality industry to manage department finances. With a strong focus on problem solving, the module will also enable students to apply the competencies gained to design other tools when joining the industry

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Use Macro recording tool, and assign macro to button.

+  Use Solver.

+  Use Active X listbox.

+  Design a fully functional Sales report, duty roster, centralized purchasing.
